LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.0.label: masochist in minor pain
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.0.description: Ow... Heh heh heh... I could get used to this!
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.1.label: masochist in serious pain
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.1.description: Ughhh... It hurts, but I love it! Keep it coming!
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.2.label: masochist in intense pain
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.2.description: Ouch... I think something's broken... But what an exquisite feeling!
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.3.label: masochist in mind-shattering pain
LanguageData.ProsthophileNoProsthetic.stages.0.label: transhumanist frustrated
LanguageData.ProsthophileNoProsthetic.stages.0.descri: Flesh is so limiting. I wish I had some kind of artificial body part.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.0.label: transhumanist pleased
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.0.description: This artificial part is cool. I want more.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.1.label: transhumanist quite pleased
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.1.description: Two artificial parts are better than one. I wish I had more.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.2.label: transhumanist delighted
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.2.description: Three artificial parts, and my weak human flesh is receding. But I still want more machine power.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.3.label: transhumanist enchanted
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.3.description: Four artificial body parts and I am becoming more than human. But there's still some flesh that needs replacing.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.4.label: transhumanist overjoyed
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.4.description: Five artificial body parts! How could an enhanced being like me ever feel sad?
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.5.label: machine body is complete
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.0.label: body purist squeamish
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.0.description: I hate having this unnatural thing attached to me. It feels so filthy!
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.1.label: body purist disgusted
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.1.description: Two artificial parts are sullying my natural, pure body. It makes me sick to think of it.
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.2.label: body purist violated
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.2.description: Three artificial parts violate my body's pure flesh. I shudder when I think of it... and these objects shudder with me.
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.3.label: body purist horrified
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.3.description: I have four artificial body parts; it's like I'm becoming a robot. What a horrifying sensation.
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.4.label: body purist nightmare
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.4.description: Five artificial body parts... Is there anything left of me? Or am I just a robot that thinks it's human?
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.5.label: I have become what I hate
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.5.description: I asked for the exact opposite of this!
LanguageData.BrawlerUnhappy.stages.0.label: brawler has ranged weapon
LanguageData.BrawlerUnhappy.stages.0.description: I hate shooting from a distance. I want to get up close and personal!
LanguageData.PyromaniacHappy.stages.0.label: pyromaniac has incendiary weapon
LanguageData.PyromaniacHappy.stages.0.description: It makes me think of flame and fire. I'm so happy.
LanguageData.ClothedNudist.stages.0.label: constraining clothes
LanguageData.ClothedNudist.stages.0.description: I'm a nudist but I have to wear these clothes. It's not unbearable - but I still feel constrained and uncomfortable.
LanguageData.HappyNude.stages.0.label: happily nude
LanguageData.HappyNude.stages.0.description: I'm nude and loving it! I feel so free and unconstrained and in touch with my surroundings!
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheDay.stages.0.label: night owl in daytime
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheDay.stages.0.descriptio: I don't like working during the day.
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheNight.stages.0.label: night owl at night
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheNight.stages.0.descript: I feel much better at night.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.0.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.0.description: I'm greedy. I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.1.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.1.description: I'm greedy. My room is pathetic! I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.2.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.2.description: I'm greedy. My room isn't nearly good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.3.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.3.description: I'm greedy. My room isn't good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.4.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.4.description: I'm greedy. My room isn't quite good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Jealous.stages.0.label: jealous of {0}'s bedroom
LanguageData.Jealous.stages.0.description: I need to have the best one!
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.0.label: ascetic has awful bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.0.description: My bedroom is just how I want it to be. Very humble and simple.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.1.label: ascetic has dull bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.1.description: My bedroom is just how I want it to be. Very humble and simple.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.2.label: ascetic has mediocre bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.2.description: My bedroom is very humble and simple. I like it.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.5.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.5.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.6.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.6.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.7.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.7.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.8.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.8.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.9.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.9.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.10.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.10.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.11.label: ascetic has impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ascetic.stages.11.description: I don't like having an impressive bedroom.
